snippet.title: Chromancy - Official Announce Trailer 2023
snippet.description: Chromancy is a shoot 'em up that tests your wits and reflexes at the same time! Using the ability to change color between red, green and blue, you will face enemies, dodge obstacles, solve puzzles and fight bosses through 50 fun and challenging levels. Can you master the power of RGB and beat this game? Play now at https://store.steampowered.com/app/1704260/Chromancy/
